apps.name: The AI Blog
apps.description: A self sustaining blog using AI

apps.name: Quiz App
apps.description: A trivia app generated using OpenAI.

apps.name: Typing Master
apps.description: A web-based typing tutor that offers personalized lessons and exercises tailored to your skill level, helping you improve typing speed and accuracy.

apps.name: AI-Powered Trivia
apps.description: An interactive trivia game that leverages AI algorithms to generate engaging questions, offering users a dynamic and immersive quiz experience.

apps.name: NodeGuru
apps.description: NodeGuru is a lightweight web app powered by OpenAI, designed to help developers master and revise Node.js concepts effortlessly.

apps.name: LinkedIn Commentor
apps.description: A Chrome extension that reads the content of a LinkedIn post, generates a relevant comment using OpenAI, and allows you to insert or copy the comment.

apps.name: Daily Programming Practice
apps.description: A web application that delivers daily programming challenges to help users enhance their coding skills through consistent practice.

apps.name: Sudoku Challenge
apps.description: A web-based Sudoku game built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, offering an interactive interface for puzzle enthusiasts.

packages.name: HeadlessTodo
packages.description: HeadlessTodo is a headless TODO management system built with a focus on clean APIs and easy front-end integration. It’s powered by Node.js and uses SQLite3 for a fully portable, file-based database, making setup and deployment ultra-simple.Built for developers who want to plug in a ready-to-use task management backend into any frontend — React, Vue, mobile apps, or even CLI tools.

packages.name: Convert CSV Files to SQL & NoSQL
packages.description: @vjnvisakh/csv2db is a lightweight Node.js utility that transforms CSV files into ready-to-use SQL or NoSQL insert statements. Ideal for developers needing to seed databases or migrate data without manual scripting.
